summary: This is an internal FBI email chain discussing an upcoming call regarding Epstein victim claim applications. The emails coordinate whether FBI personnel need to join a call where a victim services representative is expected to request documentation (302s, victim statements) from case agents.

events.title: Coordination call about Epstein victim claims
events.description: An email chain discusses an upcoming call regarding Epstein victim claim applications, where a victim services representative is expected to request FBI 302s and documentation of victim statements from case agents.

keyFacts: The document is an internal FBI email chain dated August 10, 2020.
It discusses coordination for a call regarding Epstein victim claim applications.
The call involves a victim services representative requesting FBI 302s and documentation of victim statements from case agents.
FBI personnel debate whether they need to be on the call or can follow up afterward.
The email indicates ongoing administrative and victim assistance processes related to the Epstein case in 2020.
